name: pooped
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
very tired, especially from doing a lot of work or physical activity: I can't walk any further - I'm pooped! By dinner time, I was pooped.
More examplesFewer examplesWe were all pretty pooped after a busy day.He does indeed look pooped, but no wonder.Jesse only snores when he's totally pooped.

very tired: Students are pooped because they’re juggling classes, studying, and jobs.
